shopper.name: Shopper
shopper.problem: Small and medium businesses often struggle to move their sales online quickly with a reliable, easy-to-use system. Many existing e-commerce solutions are either too complex, expensive, or inflexible. The Shopper App solves this by providing a simple, scalable e-commerce platform that allows users to browse products, manage carts, and place orders efficiently.
features: Responsive design for mobile and desktop
Secure REST API for frontend communication
implementation: Designed and implemented the full-stack architecture
Built responsive UI components using React and Tailwind CSS
Developed backend APIs for products, carts, and orders
Designed the database schema and handled data persistence
Ensured clean, maintainable code with TypeScript

evtol.name: Evtol
evtol.problem: Delivering medical and essential supplies in hard-to-reach or time-critical locations is often slow due to traffic, distance, or infrastructure limitations. The Evtol Delivery Platform addresses this by enabling efficient, drone-based delivery management.
features: Responsive design for mobile and desktop
REST API for delivery and logistics management
implementation: Built responsive UI components using React and Tailwind CSS
Built the backend APIs for delivery workflows
Ensured clean, maintainable code with TypeScript
